import React, { useState } from 'react' import RoundWrapper from '../../util/RoundWrapper' import styles from './Comment.module.css' import Logo from '../../../assets/logo.png'; import {CgMoreAlt} from 'react-icons/cg' import CommentOption from './CommentOption' const Comment = () => { const [isShowOption, setShowOption] = useState(false); const test = 'Hello this si a loreem tello thisHello this sHello this si a loreem tello thisHello this sHello this si a loreem tello thisHello this sHello this si a loreem tello thisHello this si alorem tello thisHello this si a lorem tello thisHello this si a lorem tello this si Hello this si a lorem text Hello this si a lorem tello this si s si a lorem text Hello this si a lorem text Hello this si a lorem text Hello this si a lorem text' return (
Vu Hoang Minh
{test.length > 300 ? `${test} ...show more` : test}
{isShowOption && }
2d
{/* */}
Vu Hoang Minh
Hello this si a lorem text
{isShowOption && }
2d
) } export default Comment
